name: Return to Home (James "Kanto" Burton)
description:
You have traveled through an interdimensional, alternate universe portal! You need to utilize the resources in this world to craft a way back to your home. The game currently has 2 different universes to explore and 18 colors to customize your character with.

WORLD: Default WIP
All art is what the game looked like in the developmental stage.

WORLD: Jam Entry
As a little slime, you find oil to be hazardous to your health. Slightly harder than Default WIP.

CONTROLS:
[A][D]: Move
[Shift]: Run/Quick Craft + LC
[Space]: Jump
[0-9]: Hotbar Quick Access
(Left Click): Break/Scoop Up Liquids
(Right Click): Place/Plant/Use Workbench/Use Furnace/Deposit Resource
(Mouse Wheel): Scroll through Hotbar
